name: cp20230811-AttributesAndGroups

metadata.Purpose: Attributes individually and a group added as hierarchy to populate secondary and test in git

signedGlobalXml:
<STEP-ProductInformation ExportTime="2023-08-11 10:12:52"    UseContextLocale="false">

  <Qualifiers>
    <Qualifier ID="en-US">
      <DimensionPointLink DimensionPointID="en-US"/>
    </Qualifier>
  </Qualifiers>

  <AttributeGroupList>

  <AttributeGroup ID="Display" ShowInWorkbench="true" ManuallySorted="false">
    <Name QualifierID="en-US">Display</Name>
    <MetaData>
      <Value QualifierID="en-US" AttributeID="Purpose">Used to group attributes that should be displayed together in the STEPWorkbench.</Value>
    </MetaData>
    <AttributeGroup ID="Identifiers" ShowInWorkbench="true" ManuallySorted="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Identifiers</Name>
    </AttributeGroup>
  </AttributeGroup>
  </AttributeGroupList>

  <AttributeList>

    <Attribute ID="Color" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Color</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="400" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Bicycles"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Handlebar" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Handlebar</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="400" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Bicycles"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="MarketingDescription" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Marketing Description</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="600" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Identifiers"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="itemID" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="true" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">itemID</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="100" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Identifiers"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="BottomBracket" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Bottom Bracket</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="400" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Bicycles"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="sku" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">sku</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="number" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Identifiers"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

  </AttributeList>
</STEP-ProductInformation>
